data.title: Milis, Sardinia, Italy
data.text:
Milis, a charming town nestled in the heart of Sardinia, Italy, is located at coordinates 40.0504500 latitude and 8.6370200 longitude. With a temperate Mediterranean climate, Milis enjoys warm, dry summers and mild, wet winters. Its rich history dates back to the Neolithic period, as evidenced by archaeological findings, and it has a strong cultural heritage that is reflected in its traditional festivals and local crafts.
